items.title: Version 2.3 - Shadow's Edge
items.content: New Shadow Realm dungeon, Dark Covenant faction, Void Scythes weapon type, and transmog system added. Various bugfixes including world collision issues and achievement unlocking.

items.title: Version 2.2 - Winter's Fury
items.content: Winter Solstice event with frostbound weapons, ice-themed cosmetics, and seasonal achievements. Balance changes include Blood Oath spell nerf and heavy armor movement speed buff.

vessel_1.name: BeHel'Mor
vessel_1.description: Once a devout guardian, the Void Preacher succumbed to an endless hunger — not for food, but for power. Every soul consumed strengthens his Oath, warping flesh and reality alike.
vessel_1.imageAlt: BeHel'Mor - The Gluttonous Void Preacher, devourer of forbidden knowledge

vessel_2.name: Moonlit SHADE
vessel_2.description: An unstoppable warrior clad in ancient armor. Iron Sentinels stand as unbreakable bulwarks against the darkness, protecting allies with unwavering resolve.
vessel_2.imageAlt: Iron Sentinel - Unbreakable guardian of the realm

vessel_3.name: Storm Warden
vessel_3.description: A swift hunter who commands the fury of the storm. Storm Wardens strike with lightning precision, unleashing nature's wrath upon their enemies.
vessel_3.imageAlt: Lancelot - The Honorable Storm Warden, guardian of the tempest

worldSection.title: TThe world of oathbreaker
worldSection.subtitle: Before steel, before magic — there were Oaths.
paragraphs: In the beginning, the world was bound by sacred vows. Mortals swore Oaths to ideals greater than themselves — virtues that shaped kingdoms and sins that shattered them.
When the first Oath was broken, the world fractured. From that fracture emerged the Vessels — living manifestations of belief twisted by failure, pride, hunger, and regret.
Oathbreaker is a realm shaped by choice. Every vow you swear grants power, and every vow you break leaves a scar — not just on you, but on the world itself.
